Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: As a machine learning major, i undestand how the model of chatGPT works (Transformer model). I only use it as a tutor rather than watching youtube videos etc.. It 10x my ability to learn quicker than usual, making my time effective.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback from GenAI has been statiscally been predicted to tell me what i want to hear without me telling it to explain to me the explicit and intricate details of what i would like it to elucidate whereas my lecturer could give me a much more concise and relevant answer in a heartbeat. Students like me use chatGPT very different to what other people in a different degree would such as (arts, philosophy, doctor etc.. (just wanted to point that out).

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: ChatGPT likes to talk a lot.
